parameters.name: testtype
parameters.description: Type of test.  Currently, only type 1 is implemented.

parameters.name: cycles
parameters.description: Total number of blocks. cyclesxblocksize is the number of trials

parameters.name: targprob
parameters.description: Probability of an 'x' target being presented

parameters.name: pausebetweenblocks
parameters.description: Whether a pause should occur between each ISI block

parameters.name: proportionalfoil
parameters.description: if set to 1, will use exactly 1-targprob foils;  if set to 0, will generate a foil with 1-targfoil probability on each trial
